text: Kugura muchato (Talaaq) kaviri, uye mushure maizvozvo unokwanisa kumutorazve (mudzimai) mune zvakanaka kana kumusiya mune zvakanaka. Uye hazvitenderwi kwamuri (varume) kuti mutore zvimwe zvezvinhu zvamakavapa (seMahr: Chipo chinobviswa nemurume achipa mudzimai wake pavanoroorana) kunze kwekuti vose (mukadzi nemurume) vachitya kuti havazokwanisi kutevedzera miganhu yaAllah. Uye kana muchitya kuti havazokwanisi kuchengetedza miganhu yaAllah, naizvozvo hapana chitadzo kwavari nezvaanodzorera (mudzimai, ingave Mahr yese kana chidimbu kuti vagure muchato (Khulâ€™)). Iyi ndiyo miganhu yaAllah, naizvozvo musaipfurikidze. Uye uyo munhu achapfurikidza miganhu yaAllah, zvirokwazvo, vanhu vakadaro ndivo vatadzi
